title: Goat Cheese Bruschetta
description: Toasted baguettes topped with goat cheese, sundried tomatoes, and our lemon garlic sauce.

title: Wings
description: Eight crispy wings tossed in your choice of sauce traditional buffalo or homemade BBQ.

title: Chips, Veggies, and Dip
description: Tortilla chips and vegetables with our homemade creamy cilantro ranch dip and guacamole.

title: Artichoke Dip
description: Deliciously creamy artichoke dip served with toasted baguette slices.
